Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela 
   Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il's famous work "Present Times and Duty of Young People" was brought out in booklet by the Cantaclara Publishing House in Venezuela on Jan. 28.
 The work published on Oct. 12, Juche 77 (1988) comprehensively and clearly indicates highly important tasks of the youth to devote themselves to the cause of independence against imperialism for fulfilling their obligations to the era and history and carry the revolutionary cause of Juche to accomplishment under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and ways for their implementation.

Day of Sun and February 16 to Be Commemorated in Guinea 
   Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Guinean preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated with due ceremony at the building of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea on Jan. 30.
 At the ceremony the general secretary of the party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee discussed and decided upon an action program for the red letter days.

Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Egypt and Qatar
   Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Youssef Amin Wali, vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt, on the occasion of his birthday.
 The gift was handed over to an official of the DPRK embassy in Egypt on Jan. 30.    
 Kim Jong Il was also presented with gifts by General Manager of El Shrouq Urban Development Hassan El Demerdash and General Manager of Peninsula Company Abudul Rahman of Qatar.
